p:
The timing of treatment initiation is a key parameter in both models, with delayed treatment intervention requiring higher efficacy to achieve a similar reduction in peak viremia. In our example, if treatment is initiated at D5, the treatment efficacy ε will need to be > 90% to reduce peak viremia by 3 logs or more ( Figure
4 ). Treatment initiated after peak viremia will have very little or no effect on viral dynamics.
63
